page.title: 09Schools about Aston Clinton
page.content: Osmington, Convent, Gold Field Infants are schools in Tring. Osmington is a private school and has 102 children and 16 staff. The childrens ages are from 5-12. Convent of St. Francis de Salles also a private school and has 200 children and 26 staff. The ages of the children are 2.5-18. Gold Field Infants, 175 children whose ages are 5-7 and have 6.5 teachers. Our school is called Aston Clinton County Combined it has 321 children whose ages are from 5-12 and 12 teachers. It is a big school and has a big sports field. We have two playgrounds and playing fields. This school replaced two victorian schools one of which has been demolished for housing. We have a good sized hall which is used for P.E, lunch and assemblies.
